app.name: Snes9x RX
app.long_description: Featuring: - Screenshot/Cover/Artwork display. Swap between them with the +/Z button! - Screenshot button. - Sharp / Soft / HQ2X / Scanline filter. - Wiiflow plugin mode. - FPS counter toggle. - Super FX overclock (20/40/60 MHz). - Wii U Pro Controller support. - MSU-1 support.
